articles.title: World Heart Day: Mental health support crucial for people with cardiovascular disease - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Supporting the mental health and wellbeing of over 4 million people in Australia living with cardiovascular disease (CVD) is crucial to them avoiding further heart attacks or strokes.
articles.content:
Positive mind and social connection key to recovering from cardiovascular disease
Supporting the mental health and wellbeing of over 4 million people in Australia living with cardiovascular disease … [+1962 chars]

articles.title: Scientists find 'giant' dinosaur spider fossil in Australia - indy100
articles.description: If you thought Australia’s spiders were scary, wait until you see the prehistoric version.Scientists have found a fossilised giant trapdoor spider in New South Wales, only the fourth specimen of its kind to be found in Australia.The creature would have roamed…
articles.content:
